# Copilot Instructions for styled-strong-no-need

## Project Overview
This repository contains a collection of stickers and posters with interaction design.

## Code Style and Standards
- Follow clean, readable code practices
- Maintain consistency with existing code patterns
- Use descriptive variable and function names

## Development Guidelines
- Write clear commit messages that describe the changes made
- Keep changes focused and minimal
- Test changes before committing

## Documentation
- Update README.md when adding new features or making significant changes
- Include comments for complex logic or design decisions
- Keep documentation up-to-date with code changes
